abstract: California Gov Jerry Brown offers far-reaching proposal to reduce the cost to government of public pension programs; proposal will need to be approved by voters in November.
snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown’s proposal would raise the retirement age for new state and local employees and seek higher contributions from the workers themselves.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown’s proposal would raise the retirement age for new state and local employees and seek higher contributions from the workers themselves.

headline.main: Brown Outlines Proposal to Cut California Pension Costs
headline.print_headline: Brown Outlines Proposal to Cut California Pension Costs
